body_html:
I have traced the problem to ConvND call.

f = ConvNd(_pair(stride), _pair(padding), _pair(dilation), False,
           _pair(0), groups, torch.backends.cudnn.benchmark, torch.backends.cudnn.enabled)
return f(input, weight, bias)

the last call never returns (but no crash), eventually it will time out

I have tried to disable cuDNN (torch.backends.cudnn.enabled = False), but that did not solve it

Before I spawn subprocesses for my agents, I inserted some test code and the same code does not cause any problem, and computes correctly.

body:
I have traced the problem to ConvND call.

    f = ConvNd(_pair(stride), _pair(padding), _pair(dilation), False,
               _pair(0), groups, torch.backends.cudnn.benchmark, torch.backends.cudnn.enabled)
    return f(input, weight, bias)

the last call never returns (but no crash), eventually it will time out

I have tried to disable cuDNN (torch.backends.cudnn.enabled = False), but that did not solve it

Before I spawn subprocesses for my agents, I inserted some test code and the same code does not cause any problem, and computes correctly.
